```{r, echo = FALSE}
# grep latest quarterly update
blogposts = list.files("./_posts")
blogposts = blogposts[grepl("mlr3-package-update", blogposts)]
dates = substr(blogposts, start = 1L, stop = 10)
dates = as.Date(dates)
latest = max(dates)
blogpost = blogposts[grepl(latest, blogposts)]
quarterly = sprintf("https://mlr-org.com/posts/%s/", blogpost)
```

The latest quarterly summary of what has changed in the *mlr3 ecosystem* can be found
[here](`r quarterly`).
